Package com.ansi.scilla.common.queries

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressUsage  
    ContactSearch  
    ContactUsage  
    DivisionUserCount  
    InvoiceSearch  
    InvoiceTotals  
    JobJobSchedule  
    JobSearch
    This url searches the following contact table fields for the search term: business_phone fax first_name last_name mobile_phone email and returns these same fields plus: contact_id preferred_contact The url for get will be one of: /contactSearch (retrieves all records from contact table) /contactSearch?term= (returns all records containing ) The servlet will return all records if there is no "term=" is found.
    PaymentSearch  
    PaymentSearchResult  
    PaymentTotals  
    PermissionGroupUserCount  
    QueryResult Deprecated.
    QuotePrintHistory  
    QuotePrintHistoryItem  
    QuoteSearch
    This url searches the following quote search query fields for the search term: +" "+ - manager name +" "+ - manager name +", "+ - manager name + - address 1 from the job_site_address_id and returns these same fields plus: quote.* division.* manager_name - +" "+ bill_to_name job_site_address job_site_name quote_job_count - count of jobs on the quote quote_ppc_sum - sum of the PPCs for the jobs on the quote The url for get will be one of: /quoteSearch (retrieves all records from contact table) /quoteSearch?term= (returns all records containing ) /quoteSearch?term=&sort=,...
    QuoteWriter Deprecated.
    ReportQuery

    TicketSearch
    This url searches the following contact table fields for the search term: business_phone fax first_name last_name mobile_phone email and returns these same fields plus: contact_id preferred_contact The url for get will be one of: /contactSearch (retrieves all records from contact table) /contactSearch?term= (returns all records containing ) The servlet will return all records if there is no "term=" is found.
